race.name: Bugbear
race.age: Bugbears reach adulthood at age 16 and live up to 80 years.
race.height: Bugbears are between 6 and 8 feet tall.

feature.name: Darkvision
feature.shortDescription: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

feature.name: Long-Limbed
feature.shortDescription: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

feature.name: Powerful Build
feature.shortDescription: You count as one size larger when determining your carry capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

feature.name: Surprise Attack
feature.shortDescription: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.
